valueString: Using this patient's age, gender, and serum creatinine value of 1.7,.  Estimated GFR = 43 if non African-American (mL/min/1.73 m2).  Estimated GFR = 53 if African-American (mL/min/1.73 m2).  For comparison, mean GFR for age group 40-49 is 99 (mL/min/1.73 m2).  GFR<60 = Chronic Kidney Disease, GFR<15 = Kidney Failure.
